thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exceptional Hotel
thread.title_full: Exceptional Hotel - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gopal B
title: Exceptional Hotel
text: Simply exceptional hotel, beautiful building, rooms. Staff goes above and beyond to cater to your every needs. I can't remember ever being asked what are my 'favorite things' so that they could be put in my profile. I love that! This hotel is just a wonderful place, you'll love it.
